name: Slap Mania City Mobile
description:
This game was based on Slap Mania 2M, which you can find in my uploaded games on my page. 

This game is a dumbed down version of Grand Theft Auto for your Android devices!

The goal is to hit as many people as possible to get points for your score, but also to rob banks for cash, avoid the cops, and do missions for cash!

There is an Ammo shop for buying ammo as well as upgrading your weapon.

There is also an Appearance Shop where you can buy different hats and clothing colors.

Comment anything you notice while playing that feels like it could be improved on please!
